attributes.additional_details:
Any doctor's appointment should attract the current prescription cost. A visit to the doctor means you must have been prepared to pay for a prescription.

If you do need a prescription, you have already paid.

If you don't require a prescription, you just received peace of mind from the best health service in the world.

As well as raising much needed funds, this may also reduce the pressure on doctors surgeries due to unecessary visits.
